entry.name: Correction: STR
entry.description: Base Correction value. Is affected by ReinforceWeaponParam multiplier.

entry.name: Correction: DEX
entry.description: Base Correction value. Is affected by ReinforceWeaponParam multiplier.

entry.name: Correction: INT
entry.description: Base Correction value. Is affected by ReinforceWeaponParam multiplier.

entry.name: Correction: FTH
entry.description: Base Correction value. Is affected by ReinforceWeaponParam multiplier.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Physical
entry.description: Absorption used when guarding with this weapon.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Magic
entry.description: Absorption used when guarding with this weapon.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Fire
entry.description: Absorption used when guarding with this weapon.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Lightning
entry.description: Absorption used when guarding with this weapon.

entry.name: Behavior SpEffect 1
entry.description: SpEffect applied to an entity hit by this weapon.

entry.name: Behavior SpEffect 2
entry.description: SpEffect applied to an entity hit by this weapon.

entry.name: Behavior SpEffect 3
entry.description: SpEffect applied to an entity hit by this weapon.

entry.name: Passive SpEffect 1
entry.description: SpEffect applied to the wielder of this weapon.

entry.name: Passive SpEffect 2
entry.description: SpEffect applied to the wielder of this weapon.

entry.name: Passive SpEffect 3
entry.description: SpEffect applied to the wielder of this weapon.

entry.name: Reinforcement Material Set ID
entry.description: The reinforcement material set to use. Determines which materials are required for each level of reinforcement.

entry.name: Origin Weapon +0
entry.description: ID to revert to when uninfused. Determines maximum reinforcement level (-1 means it will not reinforce to that level).

entry.name: Origin Weapon +1
entry.description: ID to revert to when uninfused. Determines maximum reinforcement level (-1 means it will not reinforce to that level).

entry.description: ID to revert to when uninfused. Determines maximum reinforcement level (-1 means it will not reinforce to that level).

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Void
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Void.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Undead
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Undead.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Ancient Draconic
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Ancient Draconic.

entry.name: Bonus Damage %: Draconic
entry.description: Applies the specified multiplier to damage against enemies tagged as Draconic.

entry.name: Guard Stability
entry.description: Determines guard stability, which acts a multiplier to stamina loss while guarding. 100 is equal to -100% stamina loss.

entry.name: Reinforce Type ID
entry.description: Determines which reinforcement multiplier set to use from ReinforceWeaponParam.

entry.name: Achievement ID
entry.description: Determines if this weapon is part of an achievement.

entry.name: Achievement Sequential ID
entry.description: Was Trophy Seq ID

entry.name: Critical Multiplier
entry.description: Added to the base 100 critical. Acts a a multiplier to damage, i.e 100 is equal to a 1.0 multiplier.

entry.name: Bow Distance Adjustment
entry.description: Applies an adjustment to the effective range of the bow/crossbow.

entry.name: Weapon Category
entry.description: Determines weapon category.

entry.name: Weapon Moveset Category
entry.description: Determines which TAE category to use as the base category.

entry.name: Guard Moveset Category
entry.description: Determines which TAE category to use as an guard override to the base category.

entry.name: Correction Type: Physical
entry.description: Apply the specified Correction curve to Physical damage/STR or DEX-based Spell Buff.

entry.name: Moveset Attribute
entry.description: Determines which hit attribute to use.

entry.name: Moveset Override Category
entry.description: Determines which TAE category to use as an override to the base category.

entry.name: Weapon Hold Position - 1H
entry.description: Determines which Idle Category to use in 1H hold from TAE.

entry.name: Weapon Hold Position - 2H
entry.description: Determines which Idle Category to use in 2H hold from TAE.

entry.name: Requirement: STR
entry.description: Determines Strength required to wield this weapon properly.

entry.name: Requirement: DEX
entry.description: Determines Dexterity required to wield this weapon properly.

entry.name: Requirement: INT
entry.description: Determines Intelligence required to wield this weapon properly.

entry.name: Requirement: FTH
entry.description: Determines Faith required to wield this weapon properly.

entry.name: Base Guard Repel
entry.description: Determines the repel value used when attacking. If this is higher than the target's attack repel, the attack will bounce.

entry.name: Base Attack Repel
entry.description: Determines the repel value used when attacking. If this is lower than the target's guard repel, the attack will bounce.

entry.name: Guard Bypass
entry.description: Determines the amount of guard absorption to ignore when attacked a guarded enemy.

entry.name: Guard Level
entry.description: Determines animation handling in HKS used when guarding.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Slash
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Slash absorption whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Strike
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Strike absorption whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Absorption: Piercing
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Piercing absorption whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Poison
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Poison inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Scarlet Rot
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Scarlet Rot inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Hemorrhage
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Hemorrhage inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Blight
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Blight inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Type Display: Normal
entry.description: Only affects the display of attack type in the menu.

entry.name: Type Display: Strike
entry.description: Only affects the display of attack type in the menu.

entry.name: Type Display: Slash
entry.description: Only affects the display of attack type in the menu.

entry.name: Type Display: Thrust
entry.description: Only affects the display of attack type in the menu.

entry.name: Is Buffable
entry.description: Determines if weapon buff effects can be applied to this weapon.

entry.name: Is a Light Source
entry.description: Determines whether this weapon is considered a Light Source.

entry.name: Can Hit Ghost Enemy
entry.description: Allows the weapon to hit enemies tagged as Ghost

entry.name: Posture Control ID - Weapon Right
entry.description: Varies based on weapon category

entry.name: Posture Control ID - Weapon Left
entry.description: Varies based on weapon category

Weapon Sheath Position ID
entry.description: Dummy Poly ID that the weapon is sheathed at.

entry.name: Toughness Correction
entry.description: Multiplier to apply to current Poise Health when this weapon is wielded.

entry.name: Is Toughness Perfomed if Poise is Initial Value
entry.description: Used by typically heavy weapons.

entry.name: Is Dual Weapon
entry.description: Determines whether the weapon utilises both hands.

entry.name: Is Auto Equipped
entry.description: Used by Ammunition to automatically equip into an empty arrow or bolt slot.

entry.name: Correction Type: Magic
entry.description: Apply the specified Correction curve to Magic damage/INT-based Spell Buff.

entry.name: Correction Type: Fire
entry.description: Apply the specified Correction curve to Fire damage/INT/FTH-based Spell Buff.

entry.name: Correction Type: Lightning
entry.description: Apply the specified Correction curve to Lightning damage/FTH-based Spell Buff.

entry.name: Correction Type: Holy
entry.description: Apply the specified Correction curve to Holy damage/FTH-based Spell Buff.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Sleep
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Sleep inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Madness
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Madness inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Requirement: ARC
entry.description: Determines Arcane required to wield this weapon properly.

entry.name: Guard Resist: Frostbite
entry.description: Flat adjustment to Frostbite inflict whilst guarding.

entry.name: Scarlet Rot Guard Resist - Max Correction
Reinforcement Menu Type
entry.description: Determines how the game handles the reinforcement of this weapon in the menu.

entry.name: Upgrade Price
entry.description: Price to infuse the weapon.
